author: obfuscate1971
content: Hey all, does anyone have an article on how attestations are actually done? As in how are blocks actually verified?

author: samwilsn
content:
My former professor and his student are doing some research on software design practices. They'd love to get some input from core developers and researchers!

If you're interested, fill out this form: https://www.surveymonkey.ca/r/JNKVPR3

Thanks!
